title: Integers instead of PFTs names
description:
The "veget" coordinate is a list of integers (0 to 15). It must be replaced by the "sector" variable with the following list of the different PFTs names:
- bare_ground
- tropical_broad_leaved_evergreen
- tropical_broad_leaved_raingreen
- temperate_needleleaf_evergreen
- temperate_broad_leaved_evergreen
- temperate_broad_leaved_summergreen
- boreal_needleleaf_evergreen
- boreal_broad_leaved_summergreen
- boreal_needleleaf_summergreen
- temperate_C3_grass
- C4_grass
- C3_agriculture
- C4_agriculture
- tropical_C3_grass
- boreal_C3_grass
